title: If there is no data for the series, it should display a friendly error message
OB: When previewing the series, no error message is shown when there is no data.
EB: When previewing the series, a friendly error message should be displayed if there is no data.
SR:
1. Open the series preview.
2. Make sure there is no data available for the series.
3. Verify that a friendly error message is displayed.
